articles.title: Israeli Forces Kill 79 Palestinians Seeking Aid in Gaza
articles.description: Israeli troops opened fire on Palestinians waiting for UN aid trucks in northern Gaza, resulting in at least 79 deaths. The UN World Food Programme reported that as the convoy approached, the crowd came under fire from Israeli tanks and snipers.

articles.title: Global Hack on Microsoft Product Hits U.S., State Agencies
articles.description: Unknown attackers exploited a vulnerability in Microsoft's SharePoint software, breaching government agencies, universities, and companies. This incident adds to Microsoft's recent cybersecurity challenges.

articles.title: Trump Sues Wall Street Journal and Rupert Murdoch Over Epstein Report
articles.description: President Trump filed a $10 billion lawsuit against the Wall Street Journal and Rupert Murdoch after the newspaper published details about a purported 2003 letter linking him to Jeffrey Epstein. Trump denies authorship, calling the article defamatory.
